title: Bizarre F1 episodes in Austria: Five GPs that took an unexpected turn
summary: From four-legged intruders to controversy and crashing at the finish line, the Austrian Grand Prix has seen its fair share of Formula 1 drama over the years

qa_pairs.question: What unusual event occurred during an Austrian Grand Prix involving animals?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A four-legged intruder on the track.
wrong_options: A horse running alongside the cars

qa_pairs.question: Which type of incident has frequently characterized the Austrian Grand Prix?
What has been a source of controversy in the history of the Austrian Grand Prix?
